text: 18.3 Tower Hamlets is a densely populated borough which faces significant development pressure, and there is limited scope to provide major additional open space to accommodate the needs of the growing population, such as new parkland and woodland. Nevertheless, the boroughâ€™s open spaces make a significant positive contribution to the character and appearance of the borough, reflecting their popularity 28 Based on figure from Open Space Strategy (2017) and 2023 Census population data for the borough 29 Parks and Open Space Strategy, 2017 30 Parks and Open Space Strategy, 2017 Tower Hamlets Local Plan 303 BIODIVERSITY AND OPEN SPACE among residents and visitors, relatively good condition, and varied use. Some parks (e.g. Victoria Park) are nationally renowned and have been awarded Green Flag status.
